quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.summary: Orange Tour Cultural Holding Ltd is an investment holding company that provides event management services and production services. The Company, along with its subsidiaries, operates the business. The event management services are engaged in devising plans for a variety of cultural, artistic, recreational and corporate promotional events in accordance to the customers' request, coordinating with suppliers for lighting, visual and audio systems, stage performances, venue decoration, logistics, software technology and other on-site operation services pertaining to the execution of the events, as well as overseeing the event promotion and execution process. Design and production services are engaged in the design and production of sketches, images and other marketing materials, such as photo albums, flyers, posters, advertisements and magazines. The Company operates its businesses primarily within the domestic market.
